item.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed or Your Money Back
item.description: Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back. When someone says, Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back they are upping the value of their promise. They are saying, You have nothing to lose. But, even if you are able to get your money back, you’ve still lost something: time and trust. Broken trust steadily erodes our lives and connections. The return of our money can’t return the time and hope for a resolution to our problem.
